kpi_info.title: Egress CLP0 cells discarded
kpi_info.use: Total egress CLP0 cells discarded because of thresholding. This counter tells how many high priority cells buffer management has discarded on egress. When the buffer fill level exceeds the CLP0+1 threshold, no cells are accepted to the buffer. Both CLP0 and CLP1 cells are discarded. Discarded CLP1 cells are counted in counter E_CLP1_DROP M528C8. The CLP0+1 thresholding parameters are fixed by the system.
